pli-tv-bu-vb-sk21:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk21:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū khambhakatā antaraghare gacchanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk21:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā khambhaṃ katvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
